scripts.clean:build: npx rimraf .cache/source .cache/binary && yarn tsc:clean && yarn cpp:clean && yarn build
scripts.doc: rimraf doc && typedoc --options typedoc.js && yarn doc:packages
scripts.docker:build:devel:main: touch .env .creds && npx cross-env DOCKER_BUILDKIT=1 DOCKER_SCAN_SUGGEST=false docker-compose -f docker-compose.devel.yml build --pull --force-rm main
scripts.docker:build:devel:packages: touch .env .creds && npx cross-env DOCKER_BUILDKIT=1 DOCKER_SCAN_SUGGEST=false docker-compose -f docker-compose.devel.yml build --force-rm packages
scripts.docker:build:devel:notebook: touch .env && npx cross-env DOCKER_BUILDKIT=1 DOCKER_SCAN_SUGGEST=false docker-compose -f docker-compose.devel.yml build --force-rm notebook
scripts.docker:build:runtime: yarn docker:build:runtime:base && yarn docker:build:devel:packages && yarn docker:build:runtime:libs && yarn docker:build:runtime:notebook
scripts.docker:build:runtime:base: touch .env && npx cross-env DOCKER_BUILDKIT=1 DOCKER_SCAN_SUGGEST=false docker-compose -f docker-compose.runtime.yml build --force-rm base
scripts.docker:build:runtime:libs: touch .env && npx cross-env DOCKER_BUILDKIT=1 DOCKER_SCAN_SUGGEST=false docker-compose -f docker-compose.runtime.yml build --force-rm --parallel main demo glfw cudf sql cuml cugraph cuspatial
scripts.docker:build:runtime:main: touch .env && npx cross-env DOCKER_BUILDKIT=1 DOCKER_SCAN_SUGGEST=false docker-compose -f docker-compose.runtime.yml build --force-rm main
scripts.docker:build:runtime:demo: touch .env && npx cross-env DOCKER_BUILDKIT=1 DOCKER_SCAN_SUGGEST=false docker-compose -f docker-compose.runtime.yml build --force-rm demo
scripts.docker:build:runtime:glfw: touch .env && npx cross-env DOCKER_BUILDKIT=1 DOCKER_SCAN_SUGGEST=false docker-compose -f docker-compose.runtime.yml build --force-rm glfw
scripts.docker:build:runtime:cudf: touch .env && npx cross-env DOCKER_BUILDKIT=1 DOCKER_SCAN_SUGGEST=false docker-compose -f docker-compose.runtime.yml build --force-rm cudf
scripts.docker:build:runtime:sql: touch .env && npx cross-env DOCKER_BUILDKIT=1 DOCKER_SCAN_SUGGEST=false docker-compose -f docker-compose.runtime.yml build --force-rm sql
scripts.docker:build:runtime:cuml: touch .env && npx cross-env DOCKER_BUILDKIT=1 DOCKER_SCAN_SUGGEST=false docker-compose -f docker-compose.runtime.yml build --force-rm cuml
scripts.docker:build:runtime:cugraph: touch .env && npx cross-env DOCKER_BUILDKIT=1 DOCKER_SCAN_SUGGEST=false docker-compose -f docker-compose.runtime.yml build --force-rm cugraph
scripts.docker:build:runtime:cuspatial: touch .env && npx cross-env DOCKER_BUILDKIT=1 DOCKER_SCAN_SUGGEST=false docker-compose -f docker-compose.runtime.yml build --force-rm cuspatial
scripts.docker:build:runtime:notebook: touch .env && npx cross-env DOCKER_BUILDKIT=1 DOCKER_SCAN_SUGGEST=false docker-compose -f docker-compose.runtime.yml build --force-rm notebook
scripts.docker:run:devel:notebook: touch .env && npx cross-env DOCKER_BUILDKIT=1 DOCKER_SCAN_SUGGEST=false docker-compose -f docker-compose.devel.yml run --rm -u $(id -u):$(id -g) notebook
scripts.docker:run:devel: touch .env && npx cross-env DOCKER_BUILDKIT=1 DOCKER_SCAN_SUGGEST=false docker-compose -f docker-compose.devel.yml run --rm -u $(id -u):$(id -g) main
scripts.docker:run:runtime:cudf: touch .env && npx cross-env DOCKER_BUILDKIT=1 DOCKER_SCAN_SUGGEST=false docker-compose -f docker-compose.runtime.yml run --rm cudf
scripts.docker:run:runtime:cugraph: touch .env && npx cross-env DOCKER_BUILDKIT=1 DOCKER_SCAN_SUGGEST=false docker-compose -f docker-compose.runtime.yml run --rm cugraph
scripts.docker:run:runtime:cuml: touch .env && npx cross-env DOCKER_BUILDKIT=1 DOCKER_SCAN_SUGGEST=false docker-compose -f docker-compose.runtime.yml run --rm cuml
scripts.docker:run:runtime:cuspatial: touch .env && npx cross-env DOCKER_BUILDKIT=1 DOCKER_SCAN_SUGGEST=false docker-compose -f docker-compose.runtime.yml run --rm cuspatial
scripts.docker:run:runtime:demo: touch .env && npx cross-env DOCKER_BUILDKIT=1 DOCKER_SCAN_SUGGEST=false docker-compose -f docker-compose.runtime.yml run --rm demo
scripts.docker:run:runtime:glfw: touch .env && npx cross-env DOCKER_BUILDKIT=1 DOCKER_SCAN_SUGGEST=false docker-compose -f docker-compose.runtime.yml run --rm glfw
scripts.docker:run:runtime:io: touch .env && npx cross-env DOCKER_BUILDKIT=1 DOCKER_SCAN_SUGGEST=false docker-compose -f docker-compose.runtime.yml run --rm io
scripts.docker:run:runtime:main: touch .env && npx cross-env DOCKER_BUILDKIT=1 DOCKER_SCAN_SUGGEST=false docker-compose -f docker-compose.runtime.yml run --rm main
scripts.docker:run:runtime:notebook: touch .env && npx cross-env DOCKER_BUILDKIT=1 DOCKER_SCAN_SUGGEST=false docker-compose -f docker-compose.runtime.yml run --rm notebook
scripts.docker:run:runtime:sql: touch .env && npx cross-env DOCKER_BUILDKIT=1 DOCKER_SCAN_SUGGEST=false docker-compose -f docker-compose.runtime.yml run --rm sql
scripts.nuke:from:orbit: yarn cache clean && yarn clean && yarn && yarn build
